channel.title: Ruiming on Ruiming's website
channel.description: Recent content in Ruiming on Ruiming's website

item.description: I’m a Ph.D. student in Bioengineering at UC Berkeley (2019–). Before I moved to Berkeley, I spent six years at UCLA and obtained B.S. in Computer Science and Applied Mathematics with Cum Laude (2017) and M.S. in Computer Science (2019). My past research was on computer vision and medical imaging. In college, I worked on knowledge graph parsing/explainable AI advised by Prof. Song-Chun Zhu. During my M.S., I worked on MRI post-analysis advised by Prof.
